title: Why Is Neil Patrick Harris Not Hosting the 88th Oscars
text:
Why Is Neil Patrick Harris Not Hosting the 88th Oscars? 
Epoch Times Saturday 24th October, 2015 
FILE - This June 12, 2011 file photo shows host Neil Patrick Harris performing during the 65th annual Tony Awards in New York. (AP Photo/Jeff Christensen, file)...
